mapper.select: SELECT e.num num, d.name dept, s.name spot, e.name name FROM department d, spot s, employee e WHERE d.num = e.dept and s.num = e.spot and e.num = #{num} ORDER BY e.num DESC
SELECT e.num num, d.name dept, s.name spot, e.name name FROM department d, spot s, employee e WHERE d.num = e.dept and s.num = e.spot ORDER BY e.num DESC

SELECT num,dept,spot,name FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, TRUNC((ROWNUM-1)/10+1) AS PAGE, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT e.num num, d.name dept, s.name spot, e.name name FROM department d, spot s, employee e WHERE d.num = e.dept and s.num = e.spot ORDER BY e.num DESC ) A ) WHERE PAGE = #{page}
